comment.author: Tyler
comment.text: Now, more than ever before, the people are responsible for the character of their Congress. If that body be ignorant, reckless and corrupt, it is because the people tolerate ignorance, recklessness and corruption .... President Garfield.

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: she could be caught eating diaper waste and her kool-aid drinking hillshills would still follow her over the cliff. wake up, sheep!

replies.author: Emily
replies.text: This day, with this post, you Hillary voters have been warned of your error. Your blood is now upon your own heads.SHE WORKS FOR THE BROTHERHOOD of DARKNESS and she worked for Obama Inc. BOTH IMPORT DEATH to AMERICA! ------ You can still change your vote! if not, May her imports find you sleeping in your imaginary safe zones in your minds.May the Lord help those that are not of the age of accountability. In Jesus Name, Amen. Ezekiel 33 1 Again the word of the LORD came unto me, saying, 2 Son of man, speak to the children of thy people, and say unto them, When I bring the sword upon a land, if the people of the land take a man of their coasts, and set him for their watchman: 3 If when he seeth the sword come upon the land, he blow the trumpet, and warn the people; 4 Then whosoever heareth the sound of the trumpet, and taketh not warning; if the sword come, and take him away, his blood shall be upon his own head. 5 He heard the sound of the trumpet, and took not warning; his blood shall be upon him. But he that taketh warning shall deliver his soul. 6 But if the watchman see the sword come, and blow not the trumpet, and the people be not warned; if the sword come, and take any person from among them, he is taken away in his iniquity; but his blood will I require at the watchman's hand. https://www.facebook.com/FoxBusiness/videos/10154672917920238/?__mref=message_bubble
